question: Which of the following UTs has its own high court?
explanation: Delhi is the only union territory that has its own high court since 1966. The Bombay High Court has jurisdiction over Dadra and Nagar Haveli, and Daman and Diu. Andaman and Nicobar Islands, Chandigarh, Lakshadweep and Puducherry come under the Calcutta, Punjab and Haryana, Kerala, and Madras High Courts respectively.
